pages.text: Permanent light can be made in numerous ways; from glowstone crystals and sticks, glowstone paste and a lit realistic torch, or from a variety of rarer natural products.  Permanent torches produce little pollution relative to campfires.

A latern is the next step in permanent lighting.  It requires a permanent torch in its recipe and carries all the benefits of torches, but not cause pollution.  Permanent lighting without ventilation in your minecraft home or safety hole.
